item.description:
Come join us for a pot luck/ bonfire Samhain party!

We will start out with appetizers from 5:30- 6:00 pm

and have a pot luck dinner, from 6:00- 7:00 pm

(details to be sent to the list!)

There will be a pumpkin carving contests- with great Pagan prizes for the best two-
and Shade face painting contest, also with prizes for the best one!

We will then head down, for a huge bonfire, for a talk about upcoming Samhain,

open pagan chat, and the sharing and reading of ghost stories!

We will also roast marshmallows, make smores, and do some drumming and chanting-

Count on it to be a great time!

Families are welcome :)
item.name: Samhain Bonfire Pot Luck Party
